oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Blunt Family correspondence, 1933 October 24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Blunt Family
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A letter sent from a member of the Blunt family to Mrs. J. H. Abel responding to a questions about Blunt family geneaology. The Blunt family included several Brainerd missionaries.
